sn49.23-34:4.1: “Mendicants, all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
sn49.23-34:4.2: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the four right endeavors depending on and grounded on ethics.
sn49.23-34:4.4: They generate enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and endeavors so that bad, unwholesome qualities don’t arise. …
sn49.23-34:4.5: so that wholesome qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
sn49.23-34:4.6: That’s how a mendicant develops and cultivates the four right endeavors depending on and grounded on ethics.”
sn49.23-34:7.2: a tree, a pot, and a spike,
sn49.23-34:7.3: the sky, and two on clouds,
sn49.23-34:7.4: a ship, a guest house, and a river.
